testcase.classname: F01_Register | users could register with new accounts
testcase.name: guest user could register with valid data successfully
testcase.system-out: Given user go to register page..............................................passed When user select gender type................................................passed And user enter first name "automation" and last name "tester"...............passed And user enter date of birth................................................passed And user enter email "test11@example.com" field.............................passed And user fills Password fields "P@ssw0rd" "P@ssw0rd"........................passed And user clicks on register button..........................................passed Then success message is displayed...........................................passed

testcase.classname: F02_Login | users could use login functionality to use their accounts
testcase.name: user could login with valid email and password
testcase.system-out: Given user go to login page.................................................passed And user login with "valid" "test11@example.com" and "P@ssw0rd".............passed And user press on login button..............................................passed Then user login to the system successfully..................................passed

testcase.classname: F02_Login | users could use login functionality to use their accounts
testcase.name: user could login with invalid email and password
testcase.system-out: Given user go to login page.................................................passed And user login with "invalid" "wrong@example.com" and "P@ssw0rd"............passed And user press on login button..............................................passed Then user could not login to the system.....................................passed

testcase.classname: F03_Home | User could change the currency
testcase.name: User could change the currency
testcase.system-out: When user press the dropdown list on the top left of home page..............passed And user select euro currency...............................................passed Then user could see products in euro currency...............................passed

testcase.name: user could search using product name
testcase.system-out: When user clicks on search..................................................passed And user types product's name "book"........................................passed And user press on search button.............................................passed Then user gets products results "book"......................................passed

testcase.name: user could search using product name 2
testcase.system-out: When user clicks on search..................................................passed And user types product's name "laptop"......................................passed And user press on search button.............................................passed Then user gets products results "laptop"....................................passed

testcase.name: user could search using product name 3
testcase.system-out: When user clicks on search..................................................passed And user types product's name "nike"........................................passed And user press on search button.............................................passed Then user gets products results "nike"......................................passed

testcase.system-out: When user clicks on search..................................................passed And user types product's sku "SCI_FAITH"....................................passed And user press on search button.............................................passed Then user gets products' sku results "SCI_FAITH"............................passed
